dict.string: Macs Fan Control allows user to change fan speed and does real-time temperature sensors monitoring.
Macs Fan Control periodically checks for software updates. You can disable automatic software update checks in the app's Preferences > General.
If you deny this connection, Macs Fan Control will not be able to tell you when a new version of the app is released.
Macs Fan Control Pro version performs this connection to correctly validate its license. No personal information is being sent.
If you deny this connection, Macs Fan Control will not be able to validate its license resulting Pro features may not work on your computer.
